Posts.Content:
As it is known that prevention is better than cure; cancer is one of those modern society diseases without having 100% cures. However by maintaining healthy lifestyle and physical fitness, the risk of breast cancer may be reduced. Here are some useful guidelines regarding lifestyle and diet for women in order to reduce the chances of breast cancer:-
Breast Feeding
Breast feeding to your baby is quit normal practice and should never be avoided it. Some ladies hesitate to breast feed the babies assuming it harmful to their breast beauty; it is wrong. Modern research disclosed that breastfeeding is very much useful to reduce the risk of breast cancer.
Be Slim and Smart.
For good health role of healthy and balanced diet can not be ruled out. But always avoid fats, being overweight and obese. With increasing age try to get rid of extra weight as research study reveals obesity in women as a risk to breast cancer. Physical exercise is necessary for active life.
Infertility
The risk of breast cancer increases in women who can not give birth before the age of thirty for any reason. So it is advisable to give birth before thirty and unnecessary delay may increase the risk of breast cancer.
Alcohol Drinking
Alcohol drinking is harmful not only for general health but it may also increase the risk of breast cancer development. Avoid alcohol or reduce its quantity and frequency in your lifestyle.
Sun Bathing
Sun bath is useful for health in cold weather countries, but frequent breasts exposure to direct sunlight for long time may increase the risk of breast cancer as well.
Fruits and Vegetables
Fruits and vegetables are a big source of antioxidants and fiber, having ability to reduce the risk of cancer. So include plenty of fruits and vegetables in your diet in order to lower breast cancer risk.
Improve Fiber intake
Fiber is also helpful to reduce breast cancer risk, which may be consumed by including diet from whole grains.
Breast Inspection
Ladies are advised to inspect their breasts for any lump, nodule or any deformity in shape regularly at least monthly. Mammography should have to do for ladies of age fifty and above annually in order to early diagnose of breast cancer if any.
Family History
Commonly the chances of developing breast cancer increase in case close relative like sister or mother is already affected. Such ladies should take extra care to avoid the risk of breast cancer.
Positive Mental Behavior
positive thinking affects the mental health, try to avoid, anger, hate, jealousy, grief, moroseness and unnecessary fears. Be positive and try to be happy with other’s joys and develop, warm, strong and lust-less relations with your relatives avoiding being victim of loneliness. 
for more details you may read http://healthbodyfit.com/4-15-9_Tips_to_Avoid_Breast_Cancer.html
http://www.healthbodyfit.com
Posts.Title: Tips to Avoid Inflammatory Breast Cancer
